metadata.title: Filbert - KSeF Invoice Management
metadata.description: Application for managing invoices in the KSeF system

hero.title: Manage KSeF invoices
hero.description: Filbert is an application for managing invoices in the Polish National e-Invoice System. Browse sales and purchase invoices, control VAT and export data.

salesInvoices.title: Sales invoices
salesInvoices.description: Browse issued invoices with automatic amount summaries

purchaseInvoices.title: Purchase invoices
purchaseInvoices.description: Control costs and VAT charged by suppliers

multipleCompanies.title: Multiple companies
multipleCompanies.description: Manage invoices of multiple companies from one account

signup.title: Create a new account
signup.passwordHint: Min. 12 characters, uppercase/lowercase letters, digit, special character

success.title: Check your inbox
success.message: We sent an activation link to {email}. Click the link to complete registration.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.success: If an account with {email} exists, we sent a password reset link.

expired.title: Link expired
expired.message: This password reset link has expired or is invalid.

success.title: Password changed
success.message: Your password has been successfully changed.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters

errors.emailNotConfirmed: Email not confirmed. Check your mailbox.
errors.userExists: User with this email already exists
errors.passwordRequirements: Password must have at least 12 characters and contain: lowercase letter, uppercase letter, digit, special character
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many attempts. Try again shortly.

companies.title: Companies
companies.subtitle: Select a company and view invoices

onboarding.title: Add company
onboarding.subtitle: Enter your company details to start using Filbert

errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

pending.title: Awaiting approval
pending.message: Your request to join company {company} has been sent to the administrator.
pending.explanation: The administrator must approve your account before you can access company data.
pending.demoHint: In the meantime, you can view demo data in the demo company.

sales.title: Sales invoices
sales.emptyMessage: No sales invoices found for selected criteria.

purchases.title: Purchase invoices
purchases.emptyMessage: No purchase invoices found for selected criteria.

errors.generic: An error occurred while saving the invoice.
errors.itemPriceNonNegative: Unit price must be 0 or greater
errors.atLeastOneItem: At least one item is required

fa3.invoiceNumberMaxLength: Invoice number must not exceed 256 characters (P_2)
fa3.issueDateFormat: Issue date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format (P_1)
fa3.issueDateFuture: Issue date cannot be in the future (P_1)
fa3.customerNameMaxLength: Customer name must not exceed 256 characters
fa3.invalidCurrency: Currency must be PLN, EUR, or USD
fa3.atLeastOneItem: At least one item is required
fa3.grossMismatch: Gross total does not match net + VAT (P_15)

item.descriptionMaxLength: Item description must not exceed 256 characters (P_7)
item.unitPriceNonNegative: Unit price must be 0 or greater (P_9A)
item.netMismatch: Net amount does not match qty x unit price (P_11)
item.vatMismatch: VAT amount does not match net x VAT rate (P_11A)

members.title: Manage members
members.demoCompanyMessage: Member management is not available for demo company.
members.adminOnlyMessage: Only administrators can manage company members.

actions.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

vendors.title: Vendors
vendors.demoCompanyMessage: Vendor management is not available for demo company.

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this vendor?

missingAlert.message: {count} vendors from purchase invoices are not yet in your vendor list.

errors.duplicateNip: A vendor with this NIP already exists

customers.title: Customers
customers.demoCompanyMessage: Customer management is not available for demo company.

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this customer?

missingAlert.message: {count} customers from sales invoices are not yet in your customer list.

errors.duplicateNip: A customer with this NIP already exists

companySettings.title: Company settings
companySettings.demoCompanyMessage: Company settings are not available for demo company.
companySettings.adminOnlyMessage: Only administrators can manage company settings.

ksef.title: KSeF credentials
ksef.description: Configure credentials for connecting to the KSeF (National e-Invoice System).
ksef.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove KSeF credentials?

delete.title: Danger zone
delete.description: Permanently delete this company and all its data.
delete.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete the company and all associated data (invoices, vendors, customers, members). This action cannot be undone.

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

invoiceNotFound.title: Invoice not found
invoiceNotFound.description: This invoice doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

api.lastAdminRemoval: Cannot remove the last administrator of the company
api.lastAdminRoleChange: Cannot change role of the last administrator
